section.des:
AI and drone-based security
management solution

section1.des:
Potholes, cracks, and aging infrastructure pose serious safety risks, yet traditional
inspections rely on time-consuming manual work, limiting real-time detection and
response.

section2.des:
ses drones and AI to detect road damage and hazards,
enabling data-driven decisions for safer, sustainable roads.

section3.title: CfSM (Car-free Street Mapping)
section3.des:
AI automatically removes
vehicles and shadows to
generate clear road maps
section3.des1:
D-ROAD reveals markings, sidewalks, and facilities hidden by vehicles
and shadows, enabling precise analysis and data use
section3.des2:
It provides high-quality datasets for HD maps, asset management,
urban planning, and broader applications

sub.title: AI-powered hazard detection
sub.des:
Using drone imagery and AI
vision, D-ROAD automatically 
identifies cracks, potholes, FOD,
and other potential risks
sub.des1:
D-ROAD collects data faster and more accurately than manual
inspections, supporting accident prevention and maintenance
decisions
sub.des2:
Its AI algorithms continuously learn, enhancing precision and
advancing road safety automation

sub1.title: Dashboard system
sub1.des:
Detected hazards and road
condition data are visualized in
real time
sub1.des1:
A map-based UI highlights locations and severity at a glance, with
reports by time and section
sub1.des2:
Through the dashboard, administrators can set response priorities
and carry out systematic, data-driven maintenance management

sub2.title: Alert service
sub2.des:
Detected road hazards and
anomalies are delivered
through real-time alerts
sub2.des1:
Enables immediate response, with automatic emergency
alerts when risk thresholds are exceeded.
sub2.des2:
The system enhances both efficiency and speed in road
safety management.

section5.des: Collecting, processing, and analyzing road data with AI and drones,

sub.title: Data Collection
sub.des:
High-resolution drone imagery
precisely captures road conditions
sub.des1:
Images are collected from multiple angles and routes to
comprehensively record overall road conditions

sub1.title: AI Detection
sub1.des:
AI detects cracks, potholes, and
other potential hazards
sub1.des1:
Using object detection and segmentation, AI extracts
location, severity, and area

sub2.title: Visualization & Alerts
sub2.des:
Visualization and real-time alerts
enable instant decision-making
sub2.des1:
Alerts are sent instantly to designated personnel, enabling
rapid response and decision-making

sub3.title: Preprocessing
sub3.des:
CfSM technology removes vehicles
and shadows to reveal clear road
data
sub3.des1: Reduces distortion and noise for higher accuracy

sub.title: Improved road safety
sub.des: D-ROAD helps prevent accidents and enhances overall safety
sub.des1: Conventional solutions are limited to specific hazards (e.g., potholes), but
sub.des2: D-ROAD detects multiple hazards simultaneously, including potholes, cracks, and debris.
sub.des3: AI quantitatively analyzes risk to effectively reduce the likelihood of traffic accidents.

sub1.title: Efficient maintenance & cost reduction
sub1.des: Manages hazards and infrastructure together to optimize maintenance
sub1.des1: Traditional inspections depend on manual checks and sampling, with high costs and risk of omissions.
sub1.des2:
D-ROAD detects facilities like manholes and drains,
cutting labor and time through drone surveys and AI automation.

sub2.title: Sustainable smart infrastructure
sub2.des: Builds a management system scalable to smart cities
sub2.des1: Conventional solutions rely on single platforms and post-event reports, slowing response.
sub2.des2: D-ROAD drives instant action with real-time alerts, connecting with Digital Twin, ITS, and smart cities.
sub2.des3: This enables continuous, eco-friendly infrastructure management and long-term smart city development.

sub.title: Partnership
sub.des:
We conduct pilot projects on real road sections in
collaboration with local governments.
sub.des1:
Going forward, we will expand our ecosystem with partners in
transportation, safety, and smart cities.

sub1.title: Scope of Applications
sub1.des: Detects hazards like cracks, potholes, and debris.
sub1.des1: Manages facilities such as manholes, drains, and signs.
sub1.des2: Extends to traffic monitoring and lane recognition.

sub2.title: Key Challenges
sub2.des: Enables early warnings for floods and collapses.
sub2.des1: Evolves into smart city management with Digital Twin and ITS.
